captions.text: Don’t call it a comb-back; I’ll have hair for years.
I’m scared. I’m scared that my abilities are gone.
I’m scared that I’m going to fuck this up.
And I’m scared of you. I don’t want to start, but I will.
This is an invocation for anyone who hasn’t begun, who’s stuck in a terrible place between
zero and one.
Let me realize that my past failures at follow-through are no indication of my future performance.
They’re just healthy little fires that are going to warm up my ass.
If my FILDI (fuck it let’s do it) is strong let me keep him in a velvet box until I really,
really need him. If my FILDI is weak let me feed him oranges
and not let him gorge himself on ego and arrogance.
Let me not hit up my Facebook like it’s a crack pipe
Keep the browser closed.
If I catch myself wearing a too-too (too fat, too late, too old) let me shake it off like
a donkey would shake off something it doesn’t like.
And when I get that feeling in my stomach — you know the feeling when all of a sudden
you get a ball of energy and it shoots down into your legs and up into your arms and tells
you to get up and stand up and go to the refrigerator and get a cheese sandwich — that’s my
cheese monster talking. And my cheese monster will never be satisfied
by cheddar, only the cheese of accomplishment.
Let me think about the people who I care about the most, and how when they fail or disappoint
me… I still love them, I still give them chances, and I still see the best in them.
Let me extend that generosity to myself.
Let me find and use metaphors to help me understand the world around me and give me the strength
to get rid of them when it’s apparent they no longer work.
Let me thank the parts of me that I don’t understand or are outside of my rational control
like my creativity and my courage. And let me remember that my courage is a wild
dog. It won’t just come when I call it, I have
to chase it down and hold on as tight as I can.
Let me not be so vain to think that I’m the sole author of my victories and a victim
of my defeats. Let me remember that the unintended meaning
that people project onto what I do is neither my fault or something I can take credit for.
Perfectionism may look good in his shiny shoes but he’s a little bit of an asshole and
no one invites him to their pool parties.
Let me remember that the impact of criticism is often not the intent of the critic, but
when the intent is evil, that’s what the block button’s for.
And when I eat my critique, let me be able to separate out the good advice from the bitter
herbs.
(There are few people who won’t be disarmed by a genuine smile
A big impact on a few can be worth more than a small impact)
Let me not think of my work only as a stepping stone to something else, and if it is, let
me become fascinated with the shape of the stone.
Let me take the idea that has gotten me this far and put it to bed.
What I am about to do will not be that, but it will be something.
There is no need to sharpen my pencils anymore. My pencils are sharp enough.
Even the dull ones will make a mark.
Warts and all. Let’s start this shit up.
And god let me enjoy this. Life isn’t just a sequence of waiting for things to be done.

comments.text:
My brother, who has been struggling with Heroin and its horrid strangehold 
on his life, and literally one minute after watching this, he dumped out 
$700 of heroin from his pockets and told me, 'I need money right now, but I 
am going to dump all of this down the toilet right now.' ZE FRANK, YOU HAVE 
SAVED A LIFE! And I cannot thank you enough for this video. I am sharing 
with everyone i know now. People need to hear this.﻿

comments.author: Astral Lexicon

comments.text:
*AN INVOCATION FOR BEGINNINGS*

My bodybellysoulSD™ business partner +Kelli May could not have shared this 
with me at a more fitting time, as I was just getting into my head this 
morning about how this or that isn't ready to launch in one way or another. 
It reminded me to value beginning, endeavoring, failing, and learning, and 
becoming a better version of myself through the process and means of just 
doing it, however imperfectly.

If you also need something to snap yourself out of analysis paralysis, give 
it a watch.

*"This in an invocation for anyone who hasn't begun. Who's stuck in a 
terrible place between zero and one... Warts and all, LET'S START THIS SHIT 
UP!"*

#chezshinae   #foodforthought   #foodforaction   #justdoit  ﻿
comments.author: Shinae Choi Robinson

comments.text: this is so beautiful. really. thank you <3﻿
comments.author: Didi O

comments.text:
To Andrew: a stranger I met online tonight who shared with me his thoughts 
and concerns about love, loss and youth. (Also Drake.) It was a shame that 
we got disconnected and our talk ended before proper goodbyes -  but here's 
to hoping you managed to check out the link I shared and it led you here. 
If you see this, I just want you to know that I'm rooting for you and hope 
the both of us will work towards being the best we can be. I know it will 
not be easy, but hopefully you will come into contact with kind and 
supportive people, who will make the journey at least a little more 
bearable. Here's to hoping we experience all that we can in this blessing 
of a life we've been given! Take care friend, and I wish you all the best.﻿

comments.text:
Very funny, a great attitude   !
Humourous and inspiring for new Plussers ... and fellow solo prenneurs who are feeling their way.

perfectionism may look good in his shiny shoes, but is a bit of an asshole, and no one invites him to pool parties ... and watch out for the Cheese Monster

Procrastination can be caused by all your web 'thingies' not being perfectly formed or connected yet, especially when you aren't techy.  But we can all do WORDS AND PICTURES. and VIDEOS.

The important thing is to simply START. :D

Perfect and formulate along the way....

#socialmediamarketingphilosophy     #procrastination   #getstarted

comments.text:
*Something I watch on a regular basis as a motivator*

I've shared this out before, and I'm feeling the need to share this out 
again. 

+ze frank's "An Invocation for Beginnings" is such a beautiful reminder to 
keep going, to not allow yourself to fall into a series of false-starts, 
and that you can actually do this- especially when it's hard.

I needed this today. Perhaps you need it as well. 

#Motivation   #YouTube   #Beginnings   #FILDI  ﻿

Have you considered medical help? The inability to hear something that 
almost everyone hears and finds inspiration in, is called 
Inauditorydouchbagism, and it is a dreadful disease. I would recommend a 
few hours of watching sickeningly sweet videos of kittens. Then you might 
be able to tell the difference between cute for the sake of cute, and an 
intelligent man struggling to help the best way he knows how. Or you can 
just fuck off. Whichever.

comments.text:
I have watched this video several times since it has been released. This is 
a true medium of motivation. One that makes us realize that we all have the 
resources, desire, and capacity to face the demons we face everyday and 
challenges that may restrain out potential.

Ze Frank, this clip is more than just a sequence of deep thoughts and 
inspiring statements. It is an invocation for beginnings. Beginnings that 
help us use yesterday's mistakes to better develop and tackle tomorrow's 
ball curves and opportunities.

Respect.﻿
